title: Pre-Service Science Teachers' Instructional Design Competency Assessment Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science pedagogy and understanding of the ADTRE model (Analysis, Design, Teach, Revise, Evaluate)
context.additional_context: Assessment of instructional design competencies based on reflection and feedback in VR simulation environments for current professionals

learning_goals: Participants can systematically evaluate instructional design competencies using reflection and feedback strategies based on the ADTRE model.
Participants can design science lesson plans in a VR simulation environment and conduct self- and peer-evaluations according to assessment rubrics.
Participants can analyze the correlation between instructional design competencies and academic achievements (e.g., Advanced Mathematics, Cell Biology) to derive educational improvement plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
